mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_cmp_volume left join tbl_cmp_vm_instance on tbl_cmp_volume.vm_id = tbl_cmp_vm_instance.vm_instance_id
select volume_id from tbl_cmp_volume where cloud_id = #{cloudId} and ee_status = 0
select count(*) from tbl_cmp_volume left join (select * from tbl_cmp_image where cloud_id = #{cloudId} and ee_status != -1) tbl_cmp_image on tbl_cmp_volume.image_id = tbl_cmp_image.image_id
